name: root
description: A single dependency and single command to configure and run various code linters and tools.

scripts.bin-ignore: git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git update-index --skip-worktree {}
scripts.bin-restore: pnpm run bin-unignore && git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git restore --source HEAD -- {} && pnpm run bin-ignore
scripts.bin-unignore: git ls-files | grep cli.js | xargs -I {} git update-index --no-skip-worktree {}
scripts.build: pnpm run build:stand-alone && pnpm run build:shared && cp ./packages/shared-config/readme.md ./readme.md
scripts.clean: pnpm run bin-restore && git clean -fdXq && rm ./pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install
scripts.release: pnpm bumpp -r --commit 'release: %s' --tag 'v%s' && pnpm -r publish --otp $(op read 'op://Personal/NPM/one-time password?attribute=otp')
